altTitles.ja: お憑かれさま、黒瀬くん

description.en:
I feel like I forgot about someone important...

Plagued by nightmares of his old hometown, Yuuma Kurose, a lonely boy with the ability to see ghosts, feels inexplicably drawn back to the place from his dreams. There, he stumbles upon Kaito Kiriyama, a boy shrouded by terrifying spirits. With a serious look in his eyes, Kaito vows he'll protect Yuuma. But the moment their skin makes contact, the spirits surrounding Kaito started to possess Yuuma!

altTitles.ja: 蓮禄昕～宿命の華～

altTitles.es-la: La heroína oculta de su Majestad

description.en:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
description.es-la: Yeon Lokheun es una niña que crece viviendo como un niño aprendiendo artes marciales y espirituales. Se dirige al palacio para limpiar el nombre de su padre, un criminal buscado, donde conoce al joven emperador Garyun. Él promete salvar la vida de su padre a cambio de sus servicios de por vida. Después de ganarse la confianza de Garyun, viaja por el mundo resolviendo problemas sobrenaturales que surgen en lugar del Emperador. ¿Pero cuánto tiempo puede continuar esta vida sin que los demás descubran que en realidad es una mujer?

altTitles.ja: くま クマ 熊 ベアー

description.en: Yuna, a 15-year-old girl, started playing the world's first VRMMO. She has earned billions of yen in stocks and confines herself in her house playing the game without going to school. Today, a major update has arrived and she obtained a non-transferable rare bear outfit. But the equipment is so embarrassing that she can't wear it even in the game. Furthermore, when she answers the survey regarding the new update and relaunches the game, she appears in an unknown forest in the bear outfit. Where is this? Email from God? A different world? If she wears the bear outfit she's a cheat, if she takes it off she's a normal girl. Her adventure starts just like that. Yuna began doing whatever she wanted.
description.ru:
Пятнадцатилетняя девочка Юна уже три года ведет жизнь хиккикомори. Друзей, школу и даже родителей ей заменяют Интернет и онлайн-игры. Год назад она начала играть в игру «Fantasy World Online» — RPG с виртуальной реальностью. Она заработала миллиарды и с помощью денег избавилась от присутствия родителей.  
  
И вот, вышло новое глобальное обновление. Как игрок с большим стажем, она по акции получила уникальный костюм. Затем прошла опрос и вместо игры оказалась в глухом лесу. Письмо от Бога? Другой мир? Что за бред?  
  
В своем новом костюме она читер. Без него обычная девочка. Так началось ее приключение, в котором она решила делать то, что ей захочется.

title.en: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!

altTitles.ja: 魔界の主役は我々だ！

altTitles.ja-ro: Makai no Shuuyaku wa Wareware da!

description.en:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: わがまま後輩くん

description.en:
“Since you already promised, I’ll take you at your word and have you go along with me until I’m satisfied.”

Toda receives a sudden confession from his Kouhai at work, Hijima. Toda wants to stay as Senpai-Kouhai like they’ve always been, but Hijima pursues a romantic relationship with him. As Toda is half-forced into dating him, Hijima has him completely wrapped around his finger...

An office love comedy between a meddlesome senpai & a cute, selfish kouhai!

altTitles.vi: Nhất quỷ nhì ma, thứ ba Takagi

altTitles.ja: からかい上手の高木さん

altTitles.es: La Maestra de las Bromas: Takagi - San

altTitles.th: แกล้งนัก รักนะ รู้ยัง?

altTitles.tl: Ang Magaling sa Panunuksong si Takagi-san

description.en:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
description.id: Komik ini bercerita tentang seorang siswa Sekolah Menengah Nishikata dan Takagi duduk bersebelahan di kelas. Takagi menikmati menggoda Nishikata dengan lelucon dan lelucon yang memalukan. Sebagai tanggapan, Nishikata membuat rencana untuk membalas dendam, tetapi dia gagal ketika dia mengidentifikasi kelemahannya dan memanfaatkannya. Dalam beberapa kasus langka di mana Takagi kehilangan tantangan, Nishikata tidak merasa seperti dia benar-benar menang. Pengaturan ini didasarkan pada kota Tonoshou di Prefektur Kagawa.
description.zh:
“脸红，你就输了！”
	
「今天一定要捉弄高木同学，让她害羞！」
某所中学，在各种方面都被邻座的女生高木同学捉弄的男生西片。
他为了对此反击而每天奋斗，但……？
这样的高木同学与西片带来的
全力「捉弄」青春大战开始了！
description.pt-br: Takagi-san, essa é a garota que se senta ao meu lado, sempre me provocando. Mas você vai ver, hoje é o dia que eu vou dar o troco e envergonhá-la!!

altTitles.ja: ヴィンランド・サガ

description.en:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

description.en: A small village finds itself at the mercy of mysterious entities that hover over the city, at least that's what young Anna often sees. On the other side of the city, Margot, a middle-aged woman, also sees the anomalies. What will be the connection between the two? Are the things they see nothing more than delusions, or do other people just not want to see them? Plot and script: Yoshino Yuki (@yoshino_yuki4) Translation : Freya Ariello (@freya.dangel) Editor : Lan Saza (@lansaza) Book publisher: Equafro Studios (@equafrostudios)
description.pt-br: Um pequeno vilarejo se encontra à mercê de misteriosas entidades que pairam a cidade, pelo menos é o que a jovem Anna costuma ver com frequência. Do outro lado da cidade, Margot, uma mulher de meia idade, também enxerga as anomalias. Qual será a ligação entre ambas? Será que as coisas que vêem não passam de delírios, ou será que as demais pessoas é que não querem vê-las?

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん
Charao-kun to Seiso-chan

altTitles.ja-ro: #Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachide wa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: #クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: いつまで名乗らないでいるつもり？

altTitles.ja-ro: Itsu Made Nanoranai de Iru Tsumori?

altTitles.en: How Long Are You Going to Keep Your Name Out?

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

altTitles.ja: 強くてニューサーガ

description.en:
The Demon King led his army of demons to wipe out the human race. The Hero, Kail, and his allies attacked the Demon King's castle to defeat the Demon King. The Demon King is slain, but at what cost? Kail lost all of his allies throughout the war. Friends, family, lovers, comrades. All dead, and he is dying.   
As Kail's life ebbs away in the Demon King's chamber, he notices a strange gem that the Demon King had coveted and approaches this relic to grab it; after an intense light glows, he is sent years into the past. After recovering from the initial shock, now in his younger body, he decides to avoid making the same mistakes of his first time through these years and to become stronger.  
  


---
description.ru:
После кровопролитного сражения маг-мечник Кайл всё-таки убивает Владыку демонов, но и сам оказывается серьёзно ранен. На грани жизни и смерти Кайл находит реликвию, хранящуюся в покоях владыки, берёт её в руку и… переносится в прошлое. Оправившись от первоначального шока, он решает использовать эту возможность, чтобы избежать повторения ошибок прошлого и стать сильнее.

---

**Notes/Trivia:**  
- In Japanese, the term for New Game Plus is "Tsuyokute New Game".
description.pt-br: Após derrotar o lorde demônio em uma batalha feroz, o espadachim magico Kyle gravemente ferido na batalha se aproxima de uma relíquia que estava em posse do lorde demônio que acaba o enviando de volta para o passado. Depois de ser recuperar do choque, ele decide usar esta oportunidade para não cometer os mesmos erros e se tornar mais forte.

altTitles.en: First of All, Let's Hide My Younger Brother
First Let's Hide My Younger Brother
Let's Hide My Younger Brother First

altTitles.ja: 弟は今留守番中です

description.en:
I've possessed a character in an R-rated BL manhwa. It's in a world where people, whose craziness ranges from one to ten, appear.

"Franz, can you take off your clothes for a moment?"

"Sister? Wh-why my clothes?"

Their crazy serenade had already begun. Having been faced with the violence my younger brother had to endure, I made a vow.

"Instead of Franz, I'll have *Schuette* instead."

Those people are coming soon. The people who will exterminate my family, and when that's not enough, they'll devour my younger brother's innocence.

"And I'll become a knight to succeed our family and carry on its legacy."

If he doesn't go, I'll die! That's how I thoroughly hid my brother and decided attend all the official events myself. …But something's wrong.

"I do! I love Kyla Vesta!"

"If Young Miss gets hurt, then I'll…"

"I don't feel the need to wait any longer."

Didn't you all like men? Why are you all suddenly obsessed with me?

---
The fate of a girl in a BL novel is a tragic one. Girls are either vaguely helpful, evil, or add nothing to the plot. So what happens when you turn into the older sister of a BL novel protagonist? The older sister who dies a tragic death at the hands of a madman who’s infatuated with your younger brother? You go with your gut instinct: hide him. Hide your brother from everything, especially men, that could harm him and you. That’s the task that Kyla Vesta is set with in this life, and a task that she’s determined to complete.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)
description.zh:
穿越到自己读过的纯爱小说里，成为了主角的姐姐！偏执狂男主的第一牺牲者竟然是我… 为了活命首先把弟弟藏起来，代替他成为骑士，可是为什么男主不按常理出牌突然开始纠缠我？！

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9A%B0%EC%84%A0-%EB%82%A8%EB%8F%99%EC%83%9D%EB%B6%80%ED%84%B0-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EC%9E%90/2649), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57492806)

* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74283)

title.en: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?

altTitles.ja: 蠱毒の胡蝶はどんな夢を見るのか？

altTitles.en: What Does the Poisonous Butterfly Dream of?

description.en:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!

title.en: Marriage Comes the Ancestor: Get Out of Bed, You Yandere Devil Emperor

altTitles.zh: Zu Zong Jia Dao: Bing Jiao Mo Di Gun Xia Ta
祖宗嫁到：病娇魔帝滚下榻

description.en: The holy heroine who roamed the three realms woke up from her sealed memory and found that her reincarnation was simply miserable. Her home was gone, her father was gone, and her sister who had taken over her place actually poached her spirit and insulted her innocence... What's even more outrageous is that she actually married the old devil who was terrified by the ghost abyss? Sacrificial bride? Plaything for entertainment? Not happening, there is no surrender in my dictionary! The beginning was a crematorium, and the process was always exciting. She turned the tide against the wind and had a gorgeous revenge! Let's see how the beautiful, strong and miserable heroine and the sickly and delicate demon emperor work together to turn the tide.

altTitles.ja: フランケン・ふらん Frantic
フランケン・ふらん フランティック

description.en:
The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue.  
  
More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.

altTitles.pt-br: Satisfazendo A Bela E Louca General

altTitles.zh-ro: Jiāoyǎngle Gè Fēng Pī Měirén Er

description.en: After being reincarnated to a year before her death, Bai Man's sole purpose in life is to kill the tyrannical emperor and take his place. To achieve her ultimate goal, she decides to seduce the formidable General Zhou Rong, a cold but beautiful woman. Who would have thought, however, that Zhou Rong is actually a crazy beauty?
description.pt-br: Depois de reencarnar um ano antes de sua morte, o único propósito de vida de Bai Man é matar o imperador tirano e tomar seu lugar. Para atingir seu objetivo final, ela decide seduzir o formidável General Zhou Rong, um homem frio, mas bonito. Quem teria pensado, entretanto, que Zhou Rong é na verdade uma mulher linda e maluca?

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.ja: ギャルくんの恋はきっと

altTitles.vi: Tình Yêu Đơn Phương Kiên Định Của Chàng Gal

description.en:
You don't know how I feel, so why are you being kind to me?

Yoshi, who is super-cheerful, has a secret after-school date with Fuji, a sober boy who is the complete opposite.
It's supposed to be "practice for Fuji-kun to find a lover", but Yoshi secretly has a crush on Fuji!?
If love is revealed, this relationship will end
But his heart throbs at times when Fuji-kun is too cool!
In fact, whereabouts of the love of the super brave Gal-kun...

A plain handsome guy who doesn't know love x a brave gal-kun who is timid about love.
description.es-la:
¿Por qué eres amable conmigo si no sabes como me siento?
El alegre y fiestero Yoshi tiene citas en secreto después de la escuela con su puro opuesto, el callado Fuji.
"Es práctica para cuando consigas pareja" es la excusa que pone Yoshi, ¿¡¿pero en realidad tiene un amor no correspondido?!?
Si descubre que lo amo, esta relación llegará a su fin, ¡pero a veces Fuji-kun es tan genial que me va a mil el corazón!
¿Qué será del amor de este chico que se esfuerza por verse bonito, pero que en realidad es super valiente?
﻿
La historia BL de un chico calmado guapo que no conoce el amor y un chico bonito que es tímido en el amor pero valiente.

altTitles.en: デｲアボリックガーデン

description.en:
In the corner of a certain town, there is a teashop where the master, Tsukasa, obtains and cares for plants from the depths of hell.  
  
[PL] W pewnym mieście znajduje się herbaciarnia, w której Tsukasa zajmuje się roślinami prosto z odmętów piekielnych.

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

altTitles.ja: 死に戻り令嬢のルチェッタ

altTitles.zh: 死而復生的露琪塔大小姐

altTitles.en: Lady Lucetta Came Back to Life

description.en:
(From Mangaupdates)

Lucetta, a daughter of a fallen family, is married to Kyle, a rich man who is after a title, in order to pay off her family's debts.
After a loveless marriage full of fights, she gets caught up in an attack targeting Kyle and dies... but she has returned to her life right after the engagement!
He decides to live happily in this life if he has come back to death.
In order to pay off her debts, Lucetta hides her face and begins to work as a fortune teller, taking advantage of her knowledge of the future.
However, Kyle shows up at to ask for advice about his love life with her.
Is it true that he has been in love with me for a long time?

Kyle wants to dote on her and Lucetta wants to break off their engagement, and the two tsundere's break off their engagement love comedy begins!

altTitles.ja: ヒッツ

altTitles.th: คู่หูนักฆ่ากับคดีสุดป่วน

description.en: A mysterious command given to Tomita Yuzu, whose livelihood is assassination. "Kill the one you meet now." However, what appeared in front of me was another self ...!? An unpredictable "Hitman's" action comedy presented by Yokusaru Shibata and Makoto Sawa's "Blue Striker" duo !!
description.ja: 暗殺を生業にしている豊田結途（トミタユズ）に下された謎の指令。 「今から会う奴を殺せ」。 しかし目の前に現れたのは、もう一人の自分で…!? 柴田ヨクサル×沢 真の『ブルーストライカー』コンビで贈る、予測不能の“殺し屋（ヒットマンズ）”アクション・コメディ!!
description.zh: 以暗杀为生的丰田结途，被下达了神秘的指令：“将接下来遇到的家伙杀掉”，但是，出现在自己眼前的，却是……！？柴田ヨクサル×沢 真组合继《Blue striker》后再次联袂献上的无法预测的“杀手（Hitmans）”动作喜剧！

altTitles.ja: 異世界もふもふカフェ

description.en: Taichi Arima is overworked at his day job. One day, going home late due to working overtime, he saves a fluffy white cat from being run over. He gains a special "Tame" ability and is transported to another world. With such a strange ability, what will he do... Why, open a Fluffy Cafe, of course!

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

title.ja: Isekai Kaeri no Daikenja-sama wa Sore Demo Kossori Kurashite Iru Tsumori desu

altTitles.ja: 異世界帰りの大賢者様はそれでもこっそり暮らしているつもりです

altTitles.en: The Great Sage Who Returned from Another World Wants to Live Quietly

description.en: Saito was reincarnated to the other world at the age of 15, becomes the Great Sage, and defeated the Demon Lord. Shortly after that, the door connecting the other world and the real world opens, and Saitou return to Japan with the power of the Great Sage. However, 19 years have passed in the real world. Saito, who was drifted away for so long, met his childhood friend Kanako, who’s now a single mother. But it seems like there’s someone who’s targeting Kanako’s life… The story of a wannabe Great Sage who came back from another world begins!
description.ja: 15歳で異世界へ転生したサイトーは 大賢者となって魔王を余裕で討伐！ 異世界と現実世界を繋ぐ扉をくぐり帰還するも 日本では19年の歳月が過ぎていて‥‥。 ウラシマ状態のサイトーが出会ったのは シングルマザーとなった幼馴染のかなこ。 なにやら、かなこの命を狙う輩がいるらしい！

title.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of the Demon King

altTitles.en: Attacking the Girls' Dormitory of Demon King

description.en: A female assassin from the modern era transmigrates into a cheesy Western-themed fantasy otome game and needs to make the Demonic male leads fall in love with her in order to save the world. Bent on returning to reality, she begins to train the assassination skills of the evil second female lead, Lisa, in the hope that Lisa will kill her, but because of her stubbornly silly personality and various types of ambiguous physical contact, she made Lisa fall in love with her?

altTitles.ja: ほんのり!どんぱっち

description.en: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!
description.ja: 不思議な生物・首領パッチと暮らすビュティ。二人は河原を散歩したり、友達とカラオケしたり、たまに喧嘩もするけど、ほんのりとした日常を過ごしています。だけど首領パッチの知り合いという破天荒が現れて!?

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan

altTitles.ru: На самом деле, я самый сильный?

altTitles.ja: 実は俺、最強でした？

altTitles.fr: Suis-je en fait le plus fort ?

altTitles.vi: Tôi Có Thực Sự Là Người Mạnh Nhất Không?

description.en:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
description.pt:
Um NEET é renascido em outro mundo com a promessa de um avida pacifica. Apesar de ter nascido na realeza, devido a sua magica parecer fraca, seus pais o abandonaram sem pensar em uma floresta para ser devorado por monstros. Contudo sua magia é desumanamente poderosa. O que ele devera fazer para obter a vida pacifica que ele tanto deseja?

Hikikomori (引き篭り) é um termo que significa literalmente isolado em casa, ele é usado para referir-se a pessoas que apresentam graves níveis de isolamento, normalmente são jovens entre 13 e 39 anos que muitas vezes são sustentados pelos pais ou trabalham online. NEET é basicamente a mesma coisa mas tem suas diferenças."
description.ru: Парень перерождается в другой мир, чтобы иметь обещанную мирную жизнь. Ребенком его бросают в лесу за низкий уровень магии, который не может быть измерен современными радарами. Что ему нужно сделать, чтобы достичь мирной жизни, которую он так желает?
description.es-la: Un chico renace en otro mundo para tener una vida pacífica. Un bebé nacido de poder y realeza, abandonado en el bosque por tener un poder que no puede ser comparado ni por los radares modernos (no, no esta ni cerca de sobrepasar los 9000). ¿Qué hara para obtener la vida pacífica que él tanto desea?"

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Fuguushoku "Kanteishi" ga Jitsu wa Saikyou Datta: Naraku de Kitaeta Saikyou no "Shingan" de Musou suru

altTitles.en: Even Given the Worthless "Appraiser" Class, I'm Actually the Strongest - Unsurpassed with the Strongest [Divine Eye] Trained in the Abyss

altTitles.ja: 不遇職【鑑定士】が実は最強だった　～奈落で鍛えた最強の【神眼】で無双する～

altTitles.en: The Unfavourable Job [Appraiser] Is Actually the Strongest ~ Unsurpassed With the Strongest [God’s Eye] That Was Trained in the Abyss

altTitles.pt-br: Mesmo tendo a classe de "Avaliador" sem valor, sou na verdade o mais forte - Insuperável com o [Olho Divino] mais forte treinado no Abismo

description.en:
In a world where [Jobs] are god-given from birth, heroes are born, not made... and Ein’s job of [Appraiser] has put him about as far from the hero pedestal as possible.

Used, abused, and eventually abandoned by his fellow adventurers, Ein decides it just isn’t worth going on... Lucky for Ein, though, the end may just be the beginning... and a new lease on life. 

Turns out, his “worthless” job may just be the key to becoming a hero after all…


---

**Links:**
- [Web Novel (Japanese)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5242fx)
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde [Jobs] são dados por Deus desde o nascimento, os heróis nascem, não são feitos... e o trabalho de [Avaliador] de Ein o colocou o mais longe possível do pedestal do herói. Usado, abusado e eventualmente abandonado por seus companheiros aventureiros, Ein decide que não vale a pena continuar... Para sorte de Ein, porém, o fim pode ser apenas o começo... e um novo sopro de vida. Acontece que seu trabalho “inútil” pode ser apenas a chave para se tornar um herói, afinal…

title.en: Uma Musume Pretty Derby: Star Blossom

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘 プリティーダービー スターブロッサム

description.en:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.

---

- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)
description.ja: 「挑戦なくして、得られるものなど何もない」　見習いトレーナー・椿が出会ったのは、ガラスの脚を抱えたデビュー前のウマ娘・サクラローレル。半人前の2人が見た頂点への夢は、無謀なのか――。

description.en:
Hwang Cho-min has been violently bullied since middle school. But when his estranged brother suddenly dies in a motorcycle accident, Cho-min finds out he was the leader of Imperial Gang, a huge gang. 

Now in possession of his brother's phone, Cho-min seizes this chance to get revenge on his high school bullies by ordering his brother's underlings to beat them up. But the King Game begins when his brother's girlfriend shows up and threatens to expose him unless he cooperates in taking down a rival gang. 

With his life now on the line, can Cho-min manage to continue this farce?

altTitles.es-la: No te burles de mi, Nagatoro

altTitles.ja: イジらないで、長瀞さん

altTitles.th: ยัยตัวแสบแอบน่ารัก นางาโทโระ

altTitles.ar: لا تلعبي معي يا آنسة ناغاتورو

altTitles.en: Don't Toy With Me, Miss Nagatoro!

altTitles.pl: Nie drocz się ze mną, Nagatoro!

altTitles.vi: Đừng bắt nạt anh nữa, Nagatoro!!!
Đừng chọc anh nữa mà, Nagatoro-san

description.en:
Naoto Hachiouji —our spineless— MC (Known also as "Senpai") is a second-year high school student and a loner who spends his afternoons at the Arts Club room. He attracts the attention of one of his schoolmates, a sadistic freshman girl named Nagatoro. However, in between the bullying and teasing, something else begins to blossom.

A lovey-dovey(…?) story between a shy nerd and an S-Dere (Sadistic Tsundere) begins.

---

**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10042/episode/313808) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/dont-toy-with-me-miss-nagatoro/)
description.es:
Naoto Hachioji está en segundo de bachillerato, es un chico tan tímido e introvertido como buen dibujante. Un día, mientras busca un sitio donde sentarse a dibujar en la biblioteca, se le caen las páginas del manga que hacía, justo al lado de un grupo de chicas que, al verlas, se ríen de él en su cara y se van… excepto una estudiante de primero, Hayase Nagatoro, que básicamente empieza a darle caña hasta hacerlo llorar.

Desde entonces, Nagatoro y consecuentemente sus amigas, no van a parar de rayar a su “senpai” y molestarlo de todas las maneras posibles… Pero hay tres cosas a tener en cuenta: Nagatoro es especialmente tocanarices cuando están a solas, se molesta bastante si sus amigas se pasan con él, y en definitiva lo que ella busca es que su senpai salga de su burbuja autoimpuesta para que se divierta y conozca un poco el mundo que lo rodea… y quizás algo más…
description.ja: 憎たらしいけど愛おしい。苦しいのに傍にいたい。あなたの中の何かが目覚める、“Sデレ少女”の物語。
description.pl:
Naoto Hachiouji to nieśmiały chłopak, którego mało co przeraża tak, jak wredne dziewczyny. Nic więc dziwnego, że jego największym szkolnym koszmarem zostaje Nagatoro – koleżanka z niższego roku, która obrała go sobie za cel, regularnie serwując mu atrakcje z pogranicza wojskowej fali i końskich zalotów. Choć wydawać by się mogło, że szkolne życie chłopaka na zawsze pozostanie pasmem nieszczęść, nieoczekiwanie relacja tych dwojga zaczyna zmierzać w niespodziewanym kierunku…

(źródło: Studio JG)
description.ru: Нагаторо - переведённая ученица в старшей школе, которой нравится дразнить своего семпая. Но он всё стерпит. И пусть ему придётся пройти через все виды издевательств - он всё простит, потому что влюблён.
description.es-la: A la estudiante de preparatoria Hayase Nagatoro le encanta pasar su tiempo libre haciendo una cosa, ¡y eso es molestar a su Senpai! Después de que Nagatoro y sus amigos se topan con los dibujos del aspirante a artista, disfrutan molestando sin piedad al tímido Senpai. Nagatoro decide continuar con su cruel juego y lo visita a diario para poder obligar a Senpai a hacer lo que le interese en ese momento, especialmente si eso lo hace sentir incómodo. Ligeramente interesado por Nagatoro y algo temeroso de ella, Senpai está constantemente involucrado en sus payasadas mientras sus intereses, pasatiempos, apariencia e incluso personalidad se usan en su contra mientras ella se entretiene a sus expensas. A medida que pasa el tiempo, Senpai se da cuenta de que no le desagrada la presencia de Nagatoro, y los dos desarrollan una amistad incómoda mientras uno soporta pacientemente las payasadas del otro.
description.pt-br: Nagatoro é uma menina de primeiro ano na escola que adora fazer bullying com seu Senpai. Mas ele aceita isso, mesmo depois de ter passado por todos os tipos de situações humilhantes e embaraçosas, porque ele está apaixonado por ela.

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai

altTitles.ja: 町人Aは悪役令嬢をどうしても救いたい～どぶと空と氷の姫君～

altTitles.en: Villager A Wants to Save the Villainess no Matter What!

altTitles.ru: Крестьянин хочет спасти злодейку любой ценой!

altTitles.vi: Dù là phản diện những tôi vẫn muốn giúp cô ấy

altTitles.id: Penduduk Desa A Ingin Menyelamatkan Tokoh Antagonis Apapun yang Terjadi!

description.en:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
description.ja: モブ以下"町人A"、家族のために悪役令嬢を救う⁉ 乙女ゲーム世界にモブ以下の存在として転生したアレン。記憶を取り戻し、数年後にヒロインのせいで街ごと蹂躙され、自分も家族も滅んでしまう!と気づき一念発起。前世のゲーム知識(チート)を駆使して成り上がることに。どぶさらいなど地道な努力とチートの結果Cランク冒険者となり、いよいよ学園入学――本来ならば学園に入ることも許されない町人Aに悪役令嬢は救えるのか?ヒロイン対町人Aの戦いがスタート!第2回アース・スターノベル大賞、佳作受賞作待望の書籍化
description.ru:
Аллен, восьмилетний мальчик из бедной семьи в королевской столице, живет бедной, но счастливой жизнью вместе со своей матерью. Однако однажды к нему внезапно возвращаются воспоминания о его прошлой жизни, и он вспоминает, что находится в симуляторе свиданий и что столица будет разрушена войной, если он ничего с этим не сделает.

Если так будет продолжаться, и он, и его мать будут убиты!

С чувством срочности он решает воспользоваться случаем, чтобы спасти жизнь своей драгоценной матери и спасти своего любимого персонажа, злодейскую юную леди Анастасию, единственную девушку, которая ему нравилась в игре, от ее слишком трагического и разрушительного конца.

Это история человека, который даже не является персонажем игры, но который борется со своей стальной решимостью и использует все имеющиеся у него знания, чтобы повернуть судьбу вспять!
description.vi:
Allen, 8 tuổi, sống trong một hoàn cảnh nghèo khó nhưng hạnh phúc với mẹ của mình. Một hôm nọ, ký ức tiền kiếp quay về. Thế giới này thực ra là một game giả lập hẹn hò và nơi cậu sống sẽ bị hủy diệt nếu như cậu không làm gì đó

Thế nên cậu quyết định giúp đỡ nữ phản diện trong game để cứu lấy cô khỏi kết thảm và cũng để cứu mẹ của mình

Đây là một câu chuyện về một nhân vật thậm chí chẳng tồn tại trong game, trên con đường lật kèo bằng ý chí và kiến thức của mình!

altTitles.ja: 再見の夜明けまで
ザイジェンの夜明けまで

description.en: Akio Fujisawa was a quiet loner—obviously the total opposite of the sociable and confident Tingyu, a Chinese exchange student who joined his class. But when Tingyu revealed the insecurities behind that confident exterior, a friendship started to blossom. Fast-forward to years after graduation, and that friendship is still going strong. Tingyu’s frequent visits to Japan keep their connection alive, all while Akio harbours some more-than-friendly feelings...

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
description.ja:
本物の恋心を、あなたは見抜けるか。

女性を恐れる男子高校生・大石饗。彼に突然告白してきた、5人の少女。そのうち4人は、人間の恋愛感情を喰らう生物「恋喰（こいばみ）」。彼女たちに恋愛感情を食べられると、二度と恋をすることができなくなってしまう。ただ、本当の告白をした1人の気持ちを、見捨てるわけにはいかない――饗は覚悟を決め、5人の中から、本命の1人を見つけだすことを決意する！
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

title.en: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou wo Hajimaru

altTitles.ja: 処刑された賢者はリッチに転生して侵略戦争を始める

altTitles.ru: Казненный мудрец переродился в некроманта и начал тотальную войну

altTitles.ar: الساحر العائد للإنتقام من العالم~الساحر الذي تم إعدامه أعيد إحيائه كليتش وبدأ حرب ضد الجميع

altTitles.th: จอมปราชญ์ผู้มีกายาเป็นลิช
ปราชญ์เกิดใหม่เป็นลิช

altTitles.ko: 처형당한 현자는 리치로 전생하여 침략 전쟁을 시작한다

altTitles.id: Sage Yang Dieksekusi Reinkarnasi Menjadi Lich Dan Memulai Perang Habis-Habisan

altTitles.en: The Executed Sage Who Was Reincarnated as a Lich Started an All-Out War

altTitles.pt-br: O Sábio que foi Executado, Reencarnou como o Lorde Demônio e Declarou Guerra com o Mundo

description.en: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
description.ja:
かつて勇者と共に世界を闇に沈めた魔王を討伐した英雄、賢者ドワイト。
しかし、その力から次代の魔王になるつもりだと無実の罪を着せられ、
死者の谷へ落とされ命を落とす…。
しかし、肉が腐り落ちるも、この世への執念からスケルトンとして
生き永らえていたドワイトは、この間違った世界を否定する事を誓い、
かつての魔王をも凌駕する力で無数のアンデッドを率い、侵略戦争を開始する…！

---
- [Web Novel (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0651fj)
description.pt-br:
O Sábio Dwight, ele junto com o Herói derrotou o Lorde Demônio que afundou o mundo na escuridão. No entanto, eles foram falsamente acusados ​​de se tornarem os próximos Lordes Demônios por causa de seu poder, e foram jogados no Vale dos Mortos para morrer…

Mas embora sua carne tenha apodrecido, 
ele vive como um esqueleto por causa de seu rancor contra o mundo. Dwight jurou negar esse mundo errado, e com um poder que supera até mesmo o Rei Demônio do passado, e também liderando incontáveis ​​esqueletos. ele vai começar uma guerra total...!

altTitles.ja: ケイヤクシマイ

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!
